content: Felony tax evasion. Yeah... $200 a day, 365 days a year since you were 12. So that's two decades, so times 20, which is $1,460,000, I think. I mean, I am just a dumb bunny, but we are good at multiplying. Anyway, according to your tax forms, you reported, let me see here... zero! Unfortunately, lying on a federal form is a punishable offense. Five years jail time.
author: Bryon Howard, Rich Moore
